text: Yeh log aap say qayamat kay mutalliq sawal kertay hain kay iss ka waqoo kabb hoga? Aap farma dijiye kay iss ka ilm sirf meray rab hi kay pass hai uss kay waqt per uss ko siwa Allah kay koi aur zahir na keray ga. Woh aasmanon aur zamin mein bara bhari (haadsa) hoga woh tum per mehaz achanak aa paray gi. Woh aap say iss tarah poochtay hain jaisay goya aap iss ki tehqiqaat ker chukay hain. Aap farma dijiye kay iss ka ilm khaas Allah hi kay pass hai lekin aksar log nahi jantay
